## Business analytics professional?

\begin{itemize}
\item  Using statistical and computational skills to answer business questions
\item  Visualizing data 
\item  Quantiative odelling (for big and small data \& for simple and complex data) 
\item  Being able to comunicate findings to experts and broad audiences 
\end{itemize}



```{r , fig.width= 10, fig.height=10}

set.seed(43)
data = data.frame(word = c("Data", "Statistics", "Decision making",
                           "R", "Computational statistics", "Modelling",
                           "Visualization", "Comunicating with data", "Business analytics"),
                  weight = c(runif(8, min = 100, max = 800), 900),
                  col = seq(1:9))

set.seed(12)
ggplot(data, aes(label = word, size = weight, color = col)) +
  geom_text_wordcloud_area() +
  scale_size_area(max_size = 100) +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("figs/word.pdf")
```

## Master of Business Analytics

\begin{itemize}
\item At least one unit of undergraduate statistics.
\item An interest in using data to solve problems and
uncover truths.
\item A combination of mathematics and computing
skills with curiosity about the world.
\item Most likely an undergraduate degree in a
quantitative discipline: engineering, computer
science, mathematics, statistics.
\end{itemize}

## Units --> Advanced Preparatory Studies

\begin{block}{Advanced preparatory studies (24 points)}
\begin{itemize}
\item  ETC5510: Introduction to data analysis
\item  ETC5242: Statistical thinking
\item  ETC5250 Introduction to machine learning
\item  ETC5550 Applied forecasting
\end{itemize}
\end{block}
